channel.title: Erorr while running RSCD source (Rune Wars )
channel.description: I am trying to get Rune Warz source to run whenever I try to get the game engine to run I get this error. I cannot log on the server ethier because of the error connecting to ls : null. Please help me out. [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/xlb7za.jpg[/img]

item.title: Erorr while running RSCD source (Rune Wars )
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

might want to post your ls and world files

Read full topic

item.title: Erorr while running RSCD source (Rune Wars )
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

Of course i know that..Its my pc not my "skills"

If you think it takes “skill” to input your ANT path into your environmental variables then you should think about taking up another hobby, because playing “java coder” just isn’t your game.

More than likely you’re doing it completely wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: Erorr while running RSCD source (Rune Wars )

item.title: Erorr while running RSCD source (Rune Wars )
item.dc:creator: @bong bong
item.description:
@bong wrote:

[quote=“C R O O K S, post:5, topic:315485”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=411926.msg3038184#msg3038184 date=1258906257]

Id help…But i dont got ant path set on this pc If you post ant path so i dont have mess about ill try find the problem/see if it works for me.

Of course i know that…Its my pc not my “skills”
If you can’t even find where you extracted ANT to, I have no doubt that you can do anything to fix the problem.
[/quote]

True… and probably you extracted it at C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin so it cant be hard at all to set your ANT path…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Erorr while running RSCD source (Rune Wars )
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:4, topic:315485”][quote author=bong link=topic=411926.msg3038106#msg3038106 date=1258904266]
Id help…But i dont got ant path set on this pc If you post ant path so i dont have mess about ill try find the problem/see if it works for me.
[/quote]

If you can’t even find where you extracted ANT to, I have no doubt that you can do anything to fix the problem.[/quote]

True… and probably you extracted it at C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin so it cant be hard at all to set your ANT path…

item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

if you downloaded that source i posted link for, its just to set the IP as localhost in ls.conf and world.xml… and it runs without any error…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 10:02:29 am[/size][hr]Btw its kinda funny that me and Bigh51 made rune warz to cody …
